featured.text: Worse yet, exposure to graphic violence and bloodshed can make them less sensitive to real-life violence and more accepting of aggression.

definition.zh_def: 流血；暴力事件，尤其是造成死亡或受傷的事件。
definition.en_def: The act of shedding blood, especially in the context of violence or conflict resulting in injury or death.
definition.example: The civil war resulted in significant bloodshed across the nation.
